tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE parent_teacher_conferences (
    conference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_name TEXT,
    teacher_name TEXT,
    conference_date DATE,
    agenda TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE parent_conferences (
 conference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 parent_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 parent_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 parent_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 scheduled_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE conference_schedule (
  conference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_id INT,
  teacher_id INT,
  scheduled_time DATETIME,
  agenda TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conference_attendance (
  attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conference_id INT,
  parent_id INT,
  teacher_id INT,
  attended BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE conference_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT REFERENCES conference_rooms(room_id),
    conference_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL
);
